Text: Any other President would have already made it their priority to take decisive action against Russia in their first year. But this President is paralyzed when it comes to Putin & his cronies in Russia. @realDonaldTrump may not say ‚ÄúRussia sanctions‚Äù tonight, but he ought to.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: Why is the President so afraid to sanction Putin, his associates, or other corrupt Russian actors and officials? Why is he giving Putin a free pass after he attacked our democracy? What is he so afraid of?

Name: SenSchumer
Text: Why won‚Äôt @realDonaldTrump use the power given to him by a near unanimous vote in Congress to hold Russia accountable for its blatant transgressions against the American people?

Name: SenSchumer
Text: There is no subject more worthy of a thorough & unbiased investigation than Russia's attack on our elections. And yet, @realDonaldTrump & his allies have waged a scorched-earth campaign to discredit the investigation in any way possible.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: Here‚Äôs something the President should discuss tonight: Russia sanctions. #SOTU

Name: SenSchumer
Text: They‚Äôre missing the step where they consult with the other side, work with the other side, earn their support. That‚Äôs the hard work of legislating in our democracy. But this Administration eschews hard work.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: There has been hardly a shred of bipartisanship in the Trump era, despite many appeals for it. @POTUS & the GOP seem to think that bipartisanship happens when one side puts together a bill and demands the support of the other side, with no negotiation or compromise.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: There are two words we‚Äôd like President Trump to say tonight about the economy: #ThanksObama. We may never hear @realDonaldTrump say those words, but he ought to. #SOTU

Name: SenSchumer

Text: The Republican attacks on the credibility of the FBI & DOJ are playing right into Putin‚Äôs hands. They constitute an attack on democracy itself & I urge the GOP & the press to stop peddling delusions of secret societies and deep states and coup d‚Äô√©tats.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: Can you imagine the outrage on the right if President Obama‚Äôs message was being spread by WikiLeaks or Julian Assange or Kremlin sources?

Name: SenSchumer
Text: The Republican campaign to attack the FBI has been joined by the same forces that interfered in the 2016 election ‚Äì WikiLeaks, Julian Assange, and Russia. Just a few years ago those things were actually attacked by the GOP, particularly by the hard right. How things have changed.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: The Republican Majority on the House Intelligence committee has manufactured a secret memo of partisan talking points, full of innuendo & glaring omissions, intended to suggest widespread corruption at the Dept. of Justice & the FBI.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: The right has waged an aggressive & coordinated attack on the integrity of the Special Counsel, and now that political smear campaign has bled into a spiraling & delusional attack on the @FBI itself.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: In 2016, @FBI was tasked with a mission of great importance to all Americans: investigating Russia‚Äôs interference in our elections. But ever since Special Counsel Mueller was appointed, the GOP & right-wing media have been desperate to distract the nation from his investigation.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: Important to remember, in the midst of a govt shutdown, the GOP - which used to be considered the "law & order party"- continued their attack on our nation's top law enforcement agency, the @FBI.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: He leaves a profound legacy and we are grateful beyond measure for his gifts to our city and our nation.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: As a pastor and leader in Harlem he built affordable housing, challenged the pestilence of the drug culture, and never stopped his passionate pursuit for equality and racial justice -- even as he changed hearts and minds and inspired countless congregants to lead better lives.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: As a civil rights leader at the very vanguard of the movement, at the most crucial time he pulled America away from hate and racism closer to its founding ideals.

Name: SenSchumer
Text: My heart sinks to hear of Rev. Wyatt Tee Walker's passing. I was privileged to be welcomed many times to Canaan Baptist and to be inspired by his words, intellect and towering dignity.

Text: Dreamers are the embodiment of so much of what this country was founded upon & today we have a new chance to finally fix our broken immigration system for Dreamers in WA & nationwide who call our country home.

Name: PattyMurray
Text:
Or Dreamers like one Pasco, WA resident who was 4 when he was flown to the U.S. Years later, after he enrolled in DACA, he was able to quit working in manual labor & start a new job as a personal banker. 

Hundreds of thousands of Dreamers have a similar story.

Name: PattyMurray
Text:
DREAMers like Jose Manuel, who grew up in South Seattle‚Äî& didn‚Äôt know he wasn‚Äôt a natural-born citizen until he went to get a driver‚Äôs license. 

Thanks to DACA, Jose Manuel was able to graduate from @UW, start a tech business, & volunteer at local non-profits.

Name: PattyMurray
Text:
Who are Dreamers? Dreamers are determined, passionate, & American in every way except on paper. 

They are fighting for the only lives they‚Äôve ever known. 

They are fighting for their loved ones with everything they‚Äôve got‚Äîand they are trying to do it the right way.

Name: PattyMurray
Text: To start, Dreamers‚Äîthousands of our friends & neighbors, teachers & firefighters, servicemembers & students‚Äîare not criminals, MS-13 gang members, nor are they a drain on our economy.

Name: PattyMurray
Text:
Finding a bipartisan path forward to both secure our borders and protect the futures of so many hardworking families is why we are here. 

Creating a more perfect union is why we are here.

First though, we must agree to some basic truths:

Name: PattyMurray
Text: As the Senate opens up debate on immigration, heading down to the floor to urge my colleagues to come together & find a bipartisan solution to protect Dreamers.

Name: PattyMurray
Text: It was nice to hear an honest answer from OMB Dir. Mulvaney in the budget hearing today. I asked if he would vote for President Trump‚Äôs budget if he were in Congress, and he said that he wouldn‚Äôt. That‚Äôs one thing we agree on! ‚ÄìPM
